attributes.text:
This actor is not used anywhere in the project. It is only here to tell you about the project. This template should work with GameSalad Creator 0.10.0 and higher.
You can delete this actor if you wish.

The LayoutSetup defines how your answers are placed on the screen. Row 1 defines the size of images and the placement of the 4 image answers. Row 2 defines the answer background image used, size of the background for the answers, and the answers in a 2x2 pattern. Row 3 defines the answer background image used, the size of the background for the answers, and the answers in a 1x4 pattern.

The QuestionMaster table contains the MasterTable of questions and answers. Do not use the Save Table behavior on this table. All data from this table is copied to the ReadWriteQuestionList table when questions are needed. This will allow you to update your game by adding and removing questions from this table. The Category column is for your use as you wish. The LayoutType column references the row in the LayoutSetup table to be used. The Question column is the text for your question. The Answer columns are either the image names or text for your answers.
